name: Mamo Ltd.
description: Mamo is a UAE-based Fintech that offers payment collection, corporate cards and expense management solutions in one beautiful, intuitive platform. Mamo is used by SMEs to automate financial operations and save on fees.
one_liner: Mamo is a UAE-based Fintech that offers payment collection, corporate cards and expense management solutions in one beautiful, intuitive platform. Mamo is used by SMEs to automate financial operations and save on fees.
